name: Kettlebell Flow: Dead Clean, Squat, Lateral Lunge, Bent Press, Tactical Clean
description: A dynamic kettlebell flow combining a dead clean, squat, lateral lunge, bent press, and tactical clean, performed continuously on one side before repeating on the other.

exercises.name: Dead Clean
exercises.description: Explosively lift the kettlebell from a dead stop on the floor to the rack position at the shoulder.
exercises.notes: Start from a dead stop each rep, not a swing.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.description: Perform a full squat with the kettlebell held in the rack position.
exercises.notes: Chest up, full depth, drive through heels.

exercises.name: Lateral Lunge
exercises.description: Step out to the side into a lunge, keeping the kettlebell in the rack position and the torso upright.
exercises.notes: Push hips back into the lunging side, keep trailing leg straight.

exercises.name: Bent Press
exercises.description: Press the kettlebell overhead by bending the torso away from the bell while maintaining control.
exercises.notes: Bend AWAY from the bell, not press upward. Classic old-time strongman lift.

exercises.name: Tactical Clean
exercises.description: A clean variation returning the kettlebell to rack position, involving a rotation or threading motion.
exercises.notes: Smooth transition back to starting position.

sequence.flow: Exercises flow continuously — dead clean to squat to lateral lunge to bent press to tactical clean, then repeat on the other side.
sequence.notes: Perform all 5 exercises as one continuous flow on one side, then repeat the entire flow on the other side.

raw.visualSummary: A woman demonstrates a kettlebell flow in a gym setting. The sequence shown includes lifting the kettlebell from the floor (dead clean), squatting with it in the rack position, performing a lateral lunge, and pressing it overhead with a bent press. The video emphasizes continuous movement and repetition on both sides.

uncertainties: Extracted from Facebook reel via yt-dlp + Gemini frame analysis (9 frames at 5-second intervals)
Creator unknown — no profile info visible in video frames
Tactical clean transition not fully visible but confirmed by text overlay
